meanings.sent1: That is the boppiest toy in the store.
meanings.sent2: She picked the boppiest dress for the party.

meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the boppiest melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The boppiest flowers bloomed brightly in the garden.

meanings.sent1: This pillow is boppiest among all the cushions.
